00012 const char *cv_moments_fields[10] = {"m00", "m10", "m01", "m20", "m11", "m02",
00013                                      "m30", "m21", "m12", "m03"};
00016 const char *cv_rotated_rect_fields[3] = {"center", "size", "angle"};
00019 const char *cv_term_criteria_fields[3] = {"type", "maxCount", "epsilon"};
00022 const char *cv_keypoint_fields[6] = {"pt", "size", "angle", "response",
00023                                      "octave", "class_id"};
00026 const char *cv_dmatch_fields[4] = {"queryIdx", "trainIdx", "imgIdx",
00027                                    "distance"};
00028 
00033 const ConstMap<mxClassID, int> DepthOf = ConstMap<mxClassID, int>
00034     (mxDOUBLE_CLASS,   CV_64F)
00035     (mxSINGLE_CLASS,   CV_32F)
00036     (mxINT8_CLASS,     CV_8S)
00037     (mxUINT8_CLASS,    CV_8U)
00038     (mxINT16_CLASS,    CV_16S)
00039     (mxUINT16_CLASS,   CV_16U)
00040     (mxINT32_CLASS,    CV_32S)
00041     (mxUINT32_CLASS,   CV_32S)
00042     (mxLOGICAL_CLASS,  CV_8U);
00043 
00048 const ConstMap<int,mxClassID> ClassIDOf = ConstMap<int,mxClassID>
00049     (CV_64F,    mxDOUBLE_CLASS)
00050     (CV_32F,    mxSINGLE_CLASS)
00051     (CV_8S,     mxINT8_CLASS)
00052     (CV_8U,     mxUINT8_CLASS)
00053     (CV_16S,    mxINT16_CLASS)
00054     (CV_16U,    mxUINT16_CLASS)
00055     (CV_32S,    mxINT32_CLASS);
00056 
00059 struct CompareSparseMatNode {
00060     bool operator () (const cv::SparseMat::Node* rhs,
00061                       const cv::SparseMat::Node* lhs)
00062     {
00063         if (rhs->idx[1] < lhs->idx[1])
00064             return true;
00065         if (rhs->idx[1] == lhs->idx[1] && rhs->idx[0] < lhs->idx[0])
00066             return true;
00067         return false;
00068     }
00069 };
00070 
00073 const ConstMap<int, std::string> InvTermCritType = ConstMap<int, std::string>
00074     (cv::TermCriteria::COUNT, "Count")
00075     (cv::TermCriteria::EPS,   "EPS")
00076     (cv::TermCriteria::COUNT+cv::TermCriteria::EPS, "Count+EPS");
00077 
00080 const ConstMap<std::string, int> TermCritType = ConstMap<std::string, int>
00081     ("Count",     cv::TermCriteria::COUNT)
00082     ("EPS",       cv::TermCriteria::EPS)
00083     ("Count+EPS", cv::TermCriteria::COUNT+cv::TermCriteria::EPS);
00084 
00085 }  // namespace

00087 MxArray& MxArray::operator=(const MxArray& rhs)
00088 {
00089     if (this != &rhs)
00090         this->p_ = rhs.p_;
00091     return *this;
00092 }

00119 MxArray::MxArray(const cv::Mat& mat, mxClassID classid, bool transpose)
00120 {
00121     if (mat.empty())
00122     {
00123         p_ = mxCreateNumericArray(0, 0, mxDOUBLE_CLASS, mxREAL);
00124         if (!p_)
00125             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Allocation error");
00126         return;
00127     }
00128     cv::Mat input = (mat.dims == 2 && transpose) ? mat.t() : mat;
00129     // Create a new mxArray.
00130     const int nchannels = input.channels();
00131     const int* dims_ = input.size;
00132     std::vector<mwSize> d(dims_, dims_ + input.dims);
00133     d.push_back(nchannels);
00134     classid = (classid == mxUNKNOWN_CLASS)
00135         ? ClassIDOf[input.depth()] : classid;
00136     std::swap(d[0], d[1]);
00137     if (classid == mxLOGICAL_CLASS)
00138     {
00139         // OpenCV's logical true is any nonzero while matlab's true is 1.
00140         cv::compare(input, 0, input, cv::CMP_NE);
00141         input.setTo(1, input);
00142         p_ = mxCreateLogicalArray(d.size(), &d[0]);
00143     }
00144     else {
00145         p_ = mxCreateNumericArray(d.size(), &d[0], classid, mxREAL);
00146     }
00147     if (!p_)
00148         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Allocation error");
00149     // Copy each channel.
00150     std::vector<cv::Mat> channels;
00151     split(input, channels);
00152     std::vector<mwSize> si(d.size(), 0); // subscript index.
00153     int type = CV_MAKETYPE(DepthOf[classid], 1); // destination type.
00154     for (int i = 0; i < nchannels; ++i)
00155     {
00156         si[si.size() - 1] = i; // last dim is a channel index.
00157         void *ptr = reinterpret_cast<void*>(
00158                 reinterpret_cast<size_t>(mxGetData(p_)) +
00159                 mxGetElementSize(p_) * subs(si));
00160         cv::Mat m(input.dims, dims_, type, ptr);
00161         channels[i].convertTo(m, type); // Write to mxArray through m.
00162     }
00163 }
00164 
00165 MxArray::MxArray(const cv::SparseMat& mat)
00166 {
00167     if (mat.dims() != 2)
00168         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "cv::Mat is not 2D");
00169     if (mat.type() != CV_32FC1)
00170         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "cv::Mat is not float");
00171     // Create a sparse array.
00172     int m = mat.size(0), n = mat.size(1), nnz = mat.nzcount();
00173     p_ = mxCreateSparse(m, n, nnz, mxREAL);
00174     if (!p_)
00175         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Allocation error");
00176     mwIndex *ir = mxGetIr(p_);
00177     mwIndex *jc = mxGetJc(p_);
00178     if (ir == NULL || jc == NULL)
00179         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Unknown error");
00180     // Sort nodes before we put elems into mxArray.
00181     std::vector<const cv::SparseMat::Node*> nodes;
00182     nodes.reserve(nnz);
00183     for (cv::SparseMatConstIterator it = mat.begin(); it != mat.end(); ++it)
00184         nodes.push_back(it.node());
00185     std::sort(nodes.begin(), nodes.end(), CompareSparseMatNode());
00186     // Copy data.
00187     double *pr = mxGetPr(p_);
00188     int i = 0;
00189     jc[0] = 0;
00190     for (std::vector<const cv::SparseMat::Node*>::const_iterator
00191          it = nodes.begin(); it != nodes.end(); ++it)
00192     {
00193         mwIndex row = (*it)->idx[0], col = (*it)->idx[1];
00194         ir[i] = row;
00195         jc[col+1] = i+1;
00196         pr[i] = static_cast<double>(mat.value<float>(*it));
00197         ++i;
00198     }
00199 }

00317 std::string MxArray::toString() const
00318 {
00319     if (!isChar())
00320         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray not of type char");
00321     char *pc = mxArrayToString(p_);
00322     std::string s(pc);
00323     mxFree(pc);
00324     return s;

00326 
00327 cv::Mat MxArray::toMat(int depth, bool transpose) const
00328 {
00329     // Create cv::Mat object.
00330     std::vector<int> d(dims(), dims()+ndims());
00331     int ndims = (d.size()>2) ? d.size()-1 : d.size();
00332     int nchannels = (d.size()>2) ? *(d.end()-1) : 1;
00333     depth = (depth==CV_USRTYPE1) ? DepthOf[classID()] : depth;
00334     std::swap(d[0], d[1]);
00335     cv::Mat mat(ndims, &d[0], CV_MAKETYPE(depth, nchannels));
00336     // Copy each channel.
00337     std::vector<cv::Mat> channels(nchannels);
00338     std::vector<mwSize> si(d.size(), 0); // subscript index
00339     int type = CV_MAKETYPE(DepthOf[classID()], 1); // Source type
00340     for (int i = 0; i<nchannels; ++i)
00341     {
00342         si[d.size()-1] = i;
00343         void *pd = reinterpret_cast<void*>(
00344                 reinterpret_cast<size_t>(mxGetData(p_))+
00345                 mxGetElementSize(p_)*subs(si));
00346         cv::Mat m(ndims, &d[0], type, pd);
00347         // Read from mxArray through m
00348         m.convertTo(channels[i], CV_MAKETYPE(depth, 1));
00349     }
00350     cv::merge(channels, mat);
00351     return (mat.dims==2 && transpose) ? cv::Mat(mat.t()) : mat;
00352 }
00353 
00354 cv::MatND MxArray::toMatND(int depth, bool transpose) const
00355 {
00356     // Create cv::Mat object.
00357     std::vector<int> d(dims(), dims()+ndims());
00358     std::swap(d[0], d[1]);
00359     cv::MatND m(ndims(), &d[0], CV_MAKETYPE(DepthOf[classID()], 1),
00360                 mxGetData(p_));
00361     // Copy.
00362     cv::MatND mat;
00363     depth = (depth==CV_USRTYPE1) ? CV_MAKETYPE(DepthOf[classID()], 1) : depth;
00364     m.convertTo(mat, CV_MAKETYPE(depth, 1));
00365     return (mat.dims==2 && transpose) ? cv::Mat(mat.t()) : mat;
00366 }
00367 
00368 cv::SparseMat MxArray::toSparseMat() const
00369 {
00370     // Check if it's sparse.
00371     if (!isSparse() || !isDouble())
00372         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not sparse");        
00373     mwIndex *ir = mxGetIr(p_);
00374     mwIndex *jc = mxGetJc(p_);
00375     if (ir == NULL || jc == NULL)
00376         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Unknown error");
00377     // Create cv::SparseMat.
00378     int m = mxGetM(p_), n = mxGetN(p_);
00379     int dims[] = {m, n};
00380     cv::SparseMat mat(2, dims, CV_32F);
00381     // Copy data.
00382     double *pr = mxGetPr(p_);
00383     for (int j=0; j<n; ++j)
00384     {
00385         mwIndex start = jc[j], end = jc[j + 1] - 1;
00386         // (row,col) <= val.
00387         for (mwIndex i = start; i <= end; ++i)
00388             mat.ref<float>(ir[i], j) = static_cast<float>(pr[i]);
00389     }
00390     return mat;
00391 }
00392 
00393 cv::Moments MxArray::toMoments(mwIndex index) const
00394 {
00395     return cv::Moments(
00396         (isField("m00")) ? at("m00", index).toDouble() : 0,
00397         (isField("m10")) ? at("m10", index).toDouble() : 0,
00398         (isField("m01")) ? at("m01", index).toDouble() : 0,
00399         (isField("m20")) ? at("m20", index).toDouble() : 0,
00400         (isField("m11")) ? at("m11", index).toDouble() : 0,
00401         (isField("m02")) ? at("m02", index).toDouble() : 0,
00402         (isField("m30")) ? at("m30", index).toDouble() : 0,
00403         (isField("m12")) ? at("m12", index).toDouble() : 0,
00404         (isField("m21")) ? at("m21", index).toDouble() : 0,
00405         (isField("m03")) ? at("m03", index).toDouble() : 0
00406     );
00407 }

00409 cv::KeyPoint MxArray::toKeyPoint(mwIndex index) const
00410 {
00411     return cv::KeyPoint(
00412         at("pt",   index).toPoint2f(),
00413         at("size", index).toDouble(),
00414         (isField("angle"))    ? at("angle",    index).toDouble() : -1,
00415         (isField("response")) ? at("response", index).toDouble() :  0,
00416         (isField("octave"))   ? at("octave",   index).toInt()    :  0,
00417         (isField("class_id")) ? at("class_id", index).toInt()    : -1
00418     );
00419 }
00420 
00421 cv::DMatch MxArray::toDMatch(mwIndex index) const
00422 {
00423     return cv::DMatch(
00424         (isField("queryIdx")) ? at("queryIdx", index).toInt()    : 0,
00425         (isField("trainIdx")) ? at("trainIdx", index).toInt()    : 0,
00426         (isField("imgIdx"))   ? at("imgIdx",   index).toInt()    : 0,
00427         (isField("distance")) ? at("distance", index).toDouble() : 0
00428     );
00429 }

00431 cv::Range MxArray::toRange() const
00432 {
00433     cv::Range r;
00434     if (isNumeric() && numel()==2)
00435         r = cv::Range(at<int>(0), at<int>(1));
00436     else if (isChar() && toString()==":")
00437         r = cv::Range::all();
00438     else
00439         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Invalid range value");
00440     return r;
00441 }
00442 
00443 cv::TermCriteria MxArray::toTermCriteria(mwIndex index) const
00444 {
00445     MxArray _type(at("type", index));
00446     return cv::TermCriteria(
00447         (_type.isChar()) ? TermCritType[_type.toString()] : _type.toInt(),
00448         at("maxCount", index).toInt(),
00449         at("epsilon", index).toDouble()
00450     );
00451 }
00452 
00453 std::string MxArray::fieldname(int index) const
00454 {
00455     const char *f = mxGetFieldNameByNumber(p_, index);
00456     if (!f)
00457         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00458                           "Failed to get field name at %d\n", index);
00459     return std::string(f);
00460 }
00461 
00462 std::vector<std::string> MxArray::fieldnames() const
00463 {
00464     if (!isStruct())
00465         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not a struct array");
00466     int n = nfields();
00467     std::vector<std::string> v;
00468     v.reserve(n);
00469     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00470         v.push_back(fieldname(i));
00471     return v;
00472 }
00473 
00474 mwIndex MxArray::subs(mwIndex i, mwIndex j) const
00475 {
00476     if (i < 0 || i >= rows() || j < 0 || j >= cols())
00477         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Subscript out of range");
00478     mwIndex s[] = {i, j};
00479     return mxCalcSingleSubscript(p_, 2, s);
00480 }
00481 
00482 mwIndex MxArray::subs(const std::vector<mwIndex>& si) const
00483 {
00484     return mxCalcSingleSubscript(p_, si.size(), &si[0]);
00485 }
00486 
00487 MxArray MxArray::at(const std::string& fieldName, mwIndex index) const
00488 {
00489     if (!isStruct())
00490         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not struct");
00491     if (index < 0 || numel() <= index)
00492         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Out of range in struct array");
00493     mxArray* pm = mxGetField(p_, index, fieldName.c_str());
00494     if (!pm)
00495         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00496                           "Field '%s' doesn't exist",
00497                           fieldName.c_str());
00498     return MxArray(pm);
00499 }
00500 
00501 template <>
00502 MxArray MxArray::at(mwIndex index) const
00503 {
00504     if (!isCell())
00505         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not cell");
00506     return MxArray(mxGetCell(p_, index));
00507 }
00508 
00509 template <>
00510 void MxArray::set(mwIndex index, const MxArray& value)
00511 {
00512     if (index < 0 || numel() <= index)
00513         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Accessing invalid range");
00514     if (!isCell())
00515         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Not cell array");
00516     mxSetCell(const_cast<mxArray*>(p_), index,
00517               static_cast<mxArray*>(value));
00518 }
00519 
00520 template <>
00521 std::vector<MxArray> MxArray::toVector() const
00522 {
00523     if (isCell())
00524     {
00525         int n = numel();
00526         std::vector<MxArray> v;
00527         v.reserve(n);
00528         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00529             v.push_back(MxArray(mxGetCell(p_, i)));
00530         return v;
00531     }
00532     else
00533         return std::vector<MxArray>(1, *this);
00534 }
00535 
00536 template <>
00537 std::vector<std::string> MxArray::toVector() const
00538 {
00539     return toVector(
00540         std::const_mem_fun_ref_t<std::string,MxArray>(&MxArray::toString));
00541 }
00542 
00543 template <>
00544 std::vector<cv::Mat> MxArray::toVector() const
00545 {
00546     std::vector<MxArray> v(toVector<MxArray>());
00547     std::vector<cv::Mat> vm;
00548     vm.reserve(v.size());
00549     for (std::vector<MxArray>::iterator it = v.begin(); it < v.end(); ++it)
00550         vm.push_back((*it).toMat());
00551     return vm;
00552 }

00568 template <>
00569 std::vector<cv::Point3f> MxArray::toVector() const
00570 {
00571     return toVector(
00572         std::const_mem_fun_ref_t<cv::Point3f, MxArray>(&MxArray::toPoint3f));
00573 }
00574 
00575 template <>
00576 std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> MxArray::toVector() const
00577 {
00578     int n = numel();
00579     std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> v;
00580     v.reserve(n);
00581     if (isCell())
00582         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00583             v.push_back(at<MxArray>(i).toKeyPoint());
00584     else if (isStruct())
00585         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00586             v.push_back(toKeyPoint(i));
00587     else
00588         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00589                           "MxArray unable to convert to std::vector");
00590     return v;
00591 }
00592 
00593 template <>
00594 std::vector<cv::DMatch> MxArray::toVector() const
00595 {
00596     int n = numel();
00597     std::vector<cv::DMatch> v;
00598     v.reserve(n);
00599     if (isCell())
00600         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00601             v.push_back(at<MxArray>(i).toDMatch());
00602     else if (isStruct())
00603         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00604             v.push_back(toDMatch(i));
00605     else
00606         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00607                           "MxArray unable to convert to std::vector");
00608     return v;
00609 }
